text: O'Galop, (June 8, 1867 - January 2, 1946) pseudonym of Marius Rossillon, is a French painter, cartoonist, poster designer and director. He was born on June 8, 1867 in Lyon and died January 2, 1946 in Carsac (Dordogne). == References == == Other websites == * Category:1867 births Category:1946 deaths
title: O'Galop
